ad_text: HJ Hauling Sponsored https://www.hjhauling.com/joinourteam/ HJ Hauling Services is seeking an experienced dump truck driver to join our team Qualified applicants must have: - multi axel dump truck experience -Class B CDL -clean MVR -be able to pass a drug test We offer -weekly pay -over time after 40 hours - health Insurance after 60 days -NO nights or Sundays required -1 week paid vacation (after the first year) -paid holidays -monthly phone allowance provided - spare equipment available No downtime due to breakdowns If you meet these requirements and are interested in joining our growing team visit https://www.hjhauling.com/joinourteam/ FULL-TIME · $45,000 - $65,000 / YEAR · SHARONVILLE, OHIO Dump Truck Driver Apply now
